dict.acceptation: （实）例，事例；情况，状况；诉讼（事件），案件，判例；容器（箱，盒）；
把…装入箱（或盒等）内；加盖于；包围，围住；[俚语]（尤指盗窃前）探察，侦查，窥测；

sent.orig: Case retrieval model directly impacts Case-Based Reasoning(CBR).
sent.trans: 事例检索模型直接影响基于事例推理(Case-BasedReasoning,CBR)的结果。

sent.orig: CBR (Case-Based Reasoning)is one of the most distinguishing methods different from RBR(Rule-Based Reasoulng)in AI.
sent.trans: CBR(Case-BasedReasoning)以完全不同于RBR(Rule—BasedReasoning)的方式在人工智能的众多技术中独树一帜。

sent.orig: The singly-quoted characters in the case statements also produce integral values that are used for comparison.
sent.trans: 在case语句中，用单引号封闭起来的字符也会产生整数值，以便我们进行比较。

sent.orig: Computer aided requirement analysis is an important research field of CASE.
sent.trans: 计算机辅助需求分析是CASE的一个重要研究领域。

sent.orig: But this quickly got out of control and dreadnought CASE tools were born.
sent.trans: 但是，这很快就乱了套，各种重磅炸弹似的CASE工具迎面而来。
